high_consensus.title: jq template file missing from Task 2.2 scope
high_consensus.description: Task 2.2 only listed generate-constraints.sh but the actual rendering logic lives in .claude/scripts/templates/claude-loa-md-table.jq. Both files must be modified.
high_consensus.recommendation: Add template file to Task 2.2 description and acceptance criteria.

high_consensus.title: CLAUDE.loa.md regeneration not listed as sprint output
high_consensus.description: Running generate-constraints.sh regenerates .claude/loa/CLAUDE.loa.md constraint tables. This significant artifact change was missing from the file change summary.
high_consensus.recommendation: Add file change summary section listing all new, modified, and regenerated files by sprint.

high_consensus.title: Task 3.3 should merge into Task 3.2
high_consensus.description: Task 3.3 Integration Verification was ambiguous ('test suite or manual'). Integration test cases belong in the test suite, not as a separate optional task.
high_consensus.recommendation: Fold Task 3.3 acceptance criteria into Task 3.2 as integration-level test cases.

disputed.title: No explicit acknowledgment of System Zone edits
disputed.description: Sprint 2 modifies multiple .claude/ files. Framework development is expected but could be called out.
disputed.resolution: deferred â€” /implement is the authorized path for System Zone modifications
